name: The Unlikely Prometheus
description:
The life of a mad scientist's servant is not a bad one, but when an angry mob shows up life gets a lot more complicated.
Can you keep the mob at bay, escape the mob, and save our hapless hero from their wrath?

Features:
A classic humorous 2D Point and Click adventure game, reminiscent of the classic Lucas-arts and Sierra games, all in a hand drawn silent movie inspired visual aesthetic.
Interact with a full cast of amusing characters, combine items in unlikely ways, and of course commit minor acts of larceny in order to escape to freedom!

A mixture of inventory, dialogue and character puzzles handled through a simple contextual verb coin.

Built up from the original (winning) entry of the $105 Adventure Game Challenge in 2021.
